1.8.2.en: Small bugfixes. Changes for the new AppStore.

1.7.0.en: Added Homey Energy support. shutterBox bugfixes.

1.4.0.en: wLightBoxS support added. Bugfix for switchBoxDC pairing.

1.3.0.en: First public release: switchBox support, switchBoxDC support, switchBoxD support, dimmerBox support, wLightBox support, airSensor support

2.0.0.en: Total rewrite for better memory allocation.

2.1.0.en: doorBox support added. gateBox pooling bug fixed.

2.1.6.en: shutterBox move to favorite position flow action added

2.2.0.en: gateBox and doorBox user authentication added

2.3.0.en: 1. switchBox driver updated to API level 20200229. 2. switchBox device info added to settings page. 3. New switchBox trigger flow cards added (fires when the device was turned on/off outside of homey, e.g. with a wall switch).

2.4.0.en: switchBox driver bugfix (double poll problem). Added information fields to dimmerBox settings page (hardware and firmware versions, product name). Added new flow triggers for dimmerBox device (fires when the device is turned on/off outside of homey - e.g. with a wall switch).

2.4.3.en: Air quality units changed from ppm to ug/m3

2.4.6.en: airSensor driver updated for new API version

3.0.0.en: - total rewrite of the code for Homey SDK V3

3.0.1.en: 1. total rewrite of the code for Homey SDK V3 2. automatic mDNS-SD discovery of the supported devices 3. support for power meter in switchBox 4. tempSensor PRO support 5. BREAKING CHANGES: due to fundamental changes in the app, recreation of all devices is REQUIRED!

3.1.0.en: rainSensor and thermoBox support added. Bugfixes.

3.3.0.en: shutterBox position set bugfix. tempSensor AC, wLightBox Pro, wLightBoxS Pro, switchBox Light, switchBox v3 (with power meter) support added. Removed unused power meter capabilities from older (v1) switchBox and switchBoxDC drivers

3.5.0.en: Added FlowCards for switchBoxD relaysand additional FlowCards for: shutterBox/DC, wLightBox

3.7.0.en: 1. dimmerBox v2 support added, 2. rollerGate support added, 3. gateBox 2022**** and 20230102 API Levels support added

3.8.0.en: 1. new device icons, 2. switchBox DIN support added, 3. switchBoxD DIN support added, 4. switchBoxT PRO support added

3.9.0.en: wLightBox* effects support added, new devices: shutterBox DIN, pixelBox, windSensor PRO, humiditySensor; new Trigger Flow Cards for some devices; thermoBox rewrite to support more scenarios and higher temperatures.

3.9.2.en: two thermoBox drivers - for room thermostat and high temperature (e.g. water tank) scenarios

3.10.0.en: actionBox and actionBoxS support added, gateBox and gateBoxPro device call changed.

3.13.1.en: Removed depreciated nodeJS methods. thermoBox separate drivers rejoined into one driver.

3.99.0.en: New Add device process. From now on for selected drivers you can select to automatically search for devices using mDNS-SD or to do it manually using user provided IP Address. New integration methods for selected drivers - the user can choose to integrate using traditional polling or by using actions or both. Redesigned polling. Now you can see on selected devices last poll action in settings (to see if connectivity with device works right), soon you will be able to restart polling if failed. Devices with new adding process: actionBox, actionBoxS, airSensor, dimmerBox, humiditySensor, pixelBox, proxiBox, rainSensor, rollerGate, saunaBox, shutterBox, shutterBoxDC, shutterBoxDIN, tempSensor, tempSensorPro, tempSensorAC,  windSensorPro, wind&RainSensor, wLightBox, wLightBoxV3, wLightBoxPro, wLightBoxS, wLightBoxS. Devices with actions and polling: floodSensor, rainSensor. Devices with actions only: actionBox, actionBoxS, proxiBox. AirSensor with new Homey build-in capabilities. New unified dimmerBox driver (for v1 & v2), v2 only driver now depreciated - recommended change to unified one. Unified wLightBox* and pixelBox* flow cards (may broke some flows using old flow cards)
